subject: Test Email - Daily Job Bot
message: This is a test email to verify the daily job email bot is working correctly.

subject: Job Application - Your Name
column4: I am writing to express my interest in the available position at your company. I believe my skills and experience align well with your requirements. Please find my resume attached. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team. Best regards.
